database.rename: ALTER DATABASE database_name RENAME TO new_name;

table.create_with_primary_key: CREATE TABLE table_name(type_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY);
table.rename: ALTER TABLE table_name RENAME TO new_name;

row.update: UPDATE table_name SET column_name = new_value WHERE condition;

column.add: ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN column_name;
column.drop: ALTER TABLE table_name DROP COLUMN column_name;
column.rename: ALTER TABLE table_name RENAME COLUMN column_name TO new_name;
column.primary_key: ALTER TABLE table_name ADD PRIMARY KEY(column_name);
column.foreign_key: ALTER TABLE table_name ADD FOREIGN KEY(column_name) REFERENCES table_name(column_name);
column.add_with_references: ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN column_name TYPE REFERENCES other_table_name(column_name);
column.constraints: ALTER TABLE table_name ADD CONSTRAINT constraint_name UNIQUE (column_name1, column_name2, ...)
column.not_null: ALTER TABLE products ALTER COLUMN product_no SET NOT NULL;
column.change_type: ALTER TABLE table_name ALTER COLUMN column_name TYPE newType;
